name: Georgios Koutsoukos
content: Georgios Koutsoukos - Royal Holloway Research Portal View Scopus Profile Georgios Koutsoukos Dr Senior Lecturer in Computer Science, Department of Computer Science https://orcid.org/0000-0002-3423-6893 Phone+44 1784 443424EmailGiorgios.Koutsoukosrhul.acuk TW20 0EX Personal profile Personal profileDr Giorgios Koutsoukos is a Senior Lecturer (Associate Professor) in the Department of Computer Science and the CEO of Code Groovers, the software company in the department of which students are the software developers - a pioneering initiative, one of only a few in the UK, which was recognized as a “Best Practice” by the British Computer Society (BCS) in 2019. From 2004 to 2021 he had also been teaching at the University of Leicester, where in 2009 he became a Honorary Visiting Fellow. Giorgios joined Royal Holloway after working in the industry for 17 years, mainly in Software Engineering, Software Project Management and Service Management, on which he has published a number of papers. Moreover, he is still an active practitioner in those areas as a consultant to a number of companies. Giorgios is also an expert in the ServiceNow platform, in which he is a Certified Implementation Specialist in Strategic Portfolio Management and in IT Service Management. Dr Koutsoukos is certified as a ITIL4 Strategist, Prince2® Practitioner in Project Management, AgilePM Practitioner and ISO/IEC 20000 (IT Service Management) Lead Implementer. He also holds the Scrum Alliance Certified ScrumMaster® certification. TeachingCS1890: Software Design CS3003: IT Project Management CS5504:Business Intelligence Systems, Infrastructures and Technologies Research output 1 Review article Research output per year Research output per year The Project Strategy Matrix: Systematizing the Design and Management of an Explicit Project StrategyKoutsoukos, G., Feb 2021, In: IEEE TRANSACTIONS ON ENGINEERING MANAGEMENT. 68, 1, p. 249-264 16 p., 8809922.Research output: Contribution to journal › Review article › peer-review
